name: Muk
description: The Sludge Pokémon. Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d10. On a 10, the attacker flinches.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: Held items cannot be stolen or knocked away from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: On melee attacks made by this Pokémon, roll a d10 on a hit. On a result of a 10, the target is poisoned.
